Articles.Content:
Greetings folks,

You can call me Roy, I'm a 25 mining technician from Quebec, Canada.

I've found this game totally randomly, on a guitar forum (sevenstring.org). Concept alone made of that game amazed me, and to my pleasure, it was even better. Tried the v0.13 for an evening, bought the game the day after, I'm hooked. I'm working on 2 ships (V-ROY-IV and MSTDN-IV), best I've done so far is put myself into Kerth's orbit and sent 3-4 ships outside Kerth,s orbit (while trying to get into the moon or any other thing's orbit lol). I'll go throught this forum, pretty sure I'll find the information I need to master my things.

Cheers!

You will most definitely find all the help you need here, especially under the How-To forum.

Sounds like you're off to a great start, welcome to the forums!

You will most definitely find all the help you need here, especially under the How-To forum.

Sounds like you're off to a great start, welcome to the forums!

Cheers man, thanks for the welcoming!

Also, if it wasn't obvious enough, english ain't my first language, so excuse any mistakes on that side, I'm doing my fair best ahaha
No worries, I'm not too far from Quebec, I love hiking in Gatineau.

Hi Vostre Roy, welcome to the community

When your rockets are done we'd love to see them, maybe you can post a few pics and a craft file in the http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/forumdisplay.php/20-The-Spacecraft-Exchange?

Hi Vostre Roy, welcome to the community

When your rockets are done we'd love to see them, maybe you can post a few pics and a craft file in the http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/forumdisplay.php/20-The-Spacecraft-Exchange?

Will do for sure, after lurking all noon during my shift, I headed back to my place with new ideas for my crafts, started a new one (codenamed TRO-II-A) wich use my MSTDN-MKIV liftoff stage, also installed and quickly tried MechJeb addon (an autopilot, my savior!). Will take some screenshot and copy my craft file on this board tomorrow.

Cheers!
